translation.en: -They've broken through the front lines! -I've lost contact with the capital!
[Bumblebee] Sorry I'm late. I hit a little traffic.
Autobots, fall back! Get to the tower!
[Decepticon 3] Destroy the launch pad! Let none escape!
translation.ko: 발사대를 파괴해! 누구도 도망 못 가게

translation.en: [Optimus] Cybertron has fallen. Get to the escape pods.
There are other Autobots scattered across the galaxy.
We must reach them if we hope to survive.
Optimus, this is our home. We have to fight for it.
We will fight on. But we must find refuge first.
translation.ko: 전투는 계속한다 하지만 은신처부터 찾아야 해

translation.en: I found a planet that's well hidden.
You will travel there and establish a base for us.
Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
If the Decepticons find it, then our people are truly finished.
translation.ko: 디셉티콘이 지구를 찾으면 우리 종족은 정말 끝이다

translation.en: Good luck, soldier. I'll buy you some time.
translation.ko: 행운을 빈다, 병사 시간을 좀 끌어주마

translation.en: Okay, okay! I'm dead already, man!
Being the overachiever that you are,
you managed to get your whole squad killed, Danny.
You know, I wouldn't know. I haven't been hit yet.
Ow! Okay, you know what? That's too close, man.
-[soldiers laughing] -You could've taken out an eye.
I got a date tonight, man. This ain't sexy!
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 데이트 있는데 이 꼴 어쩔 거야?

translation.en: This weapon is just faulty. Someone is going to get a talking to...
translation.ko: 총이 문제가 많네 항의 좀 해야겠어

translation.en: [sighs] I should've let you die in Grenada.
If you did, we wouldn't be able to come to the forest, run around and play these awesome games.
translation.ko: 그랬음 이렇게 숲에서 재미있는 놀이도 못 했지

translation.en: Wow, man, that hurts. 'Cause I love you.
But you refuse to let it in 'cause you got intimacy issues.
translation.ko: 넌 애정 표현 싫어해서 날 안 받아주지만

translation.en: A therapist will probably tell you you weren't hugged enough as a kid.
translation.ko: 넌 애정 표현 싫어해서 날 안 받아주지만 분명 어린 시절 스킨십 부족 때문이야

translation.en: -Look, man. -Danny, I know I look stupid, but...
I need medical up here now.
We have a projectile strike in the northwest corner of the training course.
translation.ko: 훈련 코스 북서부에서 포탄 공격을 받았다

translation.en: And would someone please explain to me why you dropped napalm on your own guys!
translation.ko: 그리고 대체 왜 아군을 공격한 건가?

translation.en: [soldier on radio] Negative. There are no live army drills in the northwest sector.
translation.ko: 북서부 구역에 실탄 사용 훈련은 없었다

translation.en: What the hell hit us, then?
I need all of you to fan out and track that thing down now!
Get down there now and flush that thing out!
[soldier 2 on radio] Target has been located, sir.
It's going for the mine! Cut it off!
I don't want to hurt anyone.
Who called in the Air Force?
Did you think you could hide?
Tell me where your friends are hiding.
as a member of the Autobot resistance,
you are a traitor to Cybertron
Wha-- Are those your diving trophies?
Taking up too much space in my room.
Breakfast is conveniently located in the cupboards and the fridge.
Since I'm such a big kid now, making my own breakfast and what have you.
translation.ko: 다 컸으니 직접 만들어 먹지 뭐

translation.en: You know how I could be an even bigger help around here, Mom?
translation.ko: 집안일 더 많이 도울 방법이 뭔지 알아?

translation.en: What do you know, it's my birthday tomorrow, perfect timing for a large cash gift.
translation.ko: 내일 생일이니까 목돈 선물 주면 좋잖아

translation.en: You know, $500 is really all I need to finish the Corvette.
I don't have $500. You know how much nurses make.
translation.ko: 그런 돈이 어디 있니? 간호사 월급 알잖아

translation.en: "Half as much as doctors for twice the work," right?
translation.ko: '일은 의사 두 배, 월급은 절반' 맞지?

translation.en: I got another job interview tomorrow. If all goes well, I'll have you swimming in car parts.
translation.ko: 내일 면접 봐서 취직하면 부품 왕창 사 줄게

translation.en: Don't be rude. Feed the dog.
Conan is Otis's dog. Make him do it.
[Sally] Aw! You look so grown up in your karate suit.
My baby boy is becoming a man.
Oh, shoot, I'm gonna be late.
Can you drop your brother at karate on your way to work, please?
translation.ko: 일 가는 길에 오티스 도장에 데려다줘

translation.en: Um, I could if I had a car.
Just let him follow you on your bike so nobody abducts him.
translation.ko: 자전거로 같이 가 유괴만 안 당하면 되니까

translation.en: Abducts him? You just said he's a grown man now.
If anyone tries anything, I will rupture their freaking spleen.
-That's two for you guys. -[man] Thanks, bro.
All right. Have a good one.
Excuse me. Hi. We've never actually met... Sorry, I can't right now.
translation.ko: - 안녕, 정식 인사는 못 했... - 지금 바빠서

translation.en: If I had to wear that, I would pray to be fired.
translation.ko: 저런 옷 입느니 해고되는 게 낫지

translation.en: ♪ A touch of sable In their eyes ♪
Are you still working on that damn car?
translation.ko: 그 망할 차 아직 고치고 있니?

translation.en: You still working on that damn personality?
-What have you got for me? -Whatever you want.
Russians are gonna blow us all to hell anyway.
Hand me the three-eighths, would you?
-You need the half-inch. -[Bill] I said the three...
He survived the fall of Cybertron.
And no rebellion is truly dead until the leader is vanquished.
translation.ko: 반란 진압은 지도자를 없애야 끝나는 법

translation.en: My name is Cliffjumper, lieutenant in the Autobot resistance.
translation.ko: 내 이름은 클리프점퍼 오토봇 저항군 중위

translation.en: [Shatter] We know he's planning to establish a base.
Tell us where it is and we'll let you live.
Can you trace it? Already did.
If you won't tell us where Prime is, perhaps your young friend will.
translation.ko: 네놈이 안 불면 그 어린 친구에게 물어보지

translation.en: You're a brave warrior. You deserve a better death.
translation.ko: 넌 용감한 전사야 이렇게 죽긴 아깝지

translation.en: I'll give you thirty bucks for all of it.
[chuckles] I can get twice that much for the coil alone.
translation.ko: 전선 하나만 해도 그 두 배는 받아

translation.en: From who? I'm the only one that comes in here.
I don't even know how you're still open.
Just take it. Go. My show is on.
translation.ko: 그냥 가져가 나 이거 봐야 해

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that Beetle?
I swear to God, ever since they put up that dumbass tower,
translation.ko: 저 머저리 같은 탑이 생긴 뒤로

translation.en: I can't get a signal to watch my shows.
I've got to see what happens to Alf this week.
I can't do this without you. [sobbing]
[Alf on TV] Nice to meet you. Interested in a new Buick?
[Kate on TV] Nice try. [Alf] All right, I touched. But I didn't eat.
[Kate] And I'm supposed to believe one of these steaks just got up and walked away on its own?
[Alf] But I'm starved! I've been fasting since lunch!
translation.ko: 너무 배고파! 점심 이후로 안 먹었단 말이야

translation.en: [Alf] Well, I did eat that pumpkin.
I think it's too low, honey.
No. No, I think it goes to that button.
translation.ko: 아니, 이 단추 높이에 맞춰야 해

translation.en: I don't know about... Fix it.
I love you. Come on, open your present. I'm gonna be late for work.
translation.ko: 사랑해, 선물 열어봐 빨리 출근해야 해

translation.en: So, I keep hearing about people on mopeds
translation.ko: 병원에서 그러는데 전동 자전거 타다 머리 다친 사람이 많대

translation.en: getting run over and their brains smashed in.
translation.ko: 전동 자전거 타다 머리 다친 사람이 많대

translation.en: You got to wear this from now on.
I don't care if it's not the law. It's our law.
Plus, look how cute it is.
I actually got you a little gift, too, Charlie.
I mean, it's small, but, it's from the heart.
A smile is a powerful thing.
It says to the world, "I'm fun and approachable."
You know, there's a whole chapter in here about how people who smile more often
translation.ko: 자주 미소 짓는 사람이 친구가 더 많은 이유를

translation.en: I really think it's gonna change your whole outlook if you smile more often.
translation.ko: 더 자주 웃다 보면 인생관도 바뀔 거야

translation.en: I'll make you a deal. If I get that thing started, it's mine.
translation.ko: 거래해요, 시동 걸면 제가 가져가는 거로

translation.en: That's no deal. That's just you taking my car.
translation.ko: 그게 무슨 거래야 네가 내 차를 갖는 거지

translation.en: If I get it started, I keep it and I work here every day for a year!
translation.ko: 시동 걸면 제가 갖고 1년간 매일 와서 일할게요

translation.en: I'll scrub the grease off the floors, okay?
I will pick up and organize every scrap of paper in this place.
I'll even detail your horrible, disgusting toilets.
translation.ko: 토할 만큼 더러운 저 화장실도 청소할게요

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you!
Oh, my God, thank you so much! I love you!
That thing ain't even safe to drive.
Nothing! I'm fine. Mom, you should go back to bed. Everything's fine.
What is that car doing in our garage?
Uncle Hank gave it to me.
I wish you would've told me before you brought it home.
Um, I'm in the middle of some stuff, Mom.
Okay, I'll get out of your hair, but...
You don't know or you don't have a name?
You sound like a little bumblebee.
I'm gonna call you that from now on.
-Come on, Amber. -Give me one good reason.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 이유 하나만 대봐

translation.en: You tried to sleep with my sister!
That down payment was for a house. You bought a car.
translation.ko: 집 잔금 낼 돈으로 차를 사지 않나

translation.en: How stupid are you, Roy? We don't need a car. God!
Now, just settle down for one second and hear me out.
Oh, God, Roy, that thing is coming right for us!
Not my car. Not my car.
Please, God, no, not my car!
Oh, that's good, baby. That's good.
The indigenous life is even more primitive than I expected.
Hmm. I like the way they pop.
B-127's distress signal came from the western coast of this continent.
translation.ko: B-127의 조난 신호가 이 대륙 서쪽 해안에서 왔어

translation.en: [Ron] When do they start letting you use nunchucks?
[Otis] I don't know, but I hope soon.
-Morning! See you guys later. -Where you off to so fast?
translation.ko: - 좋은 아침! 이따 봐요 - 어딜 그리 서둘러 가?

translation.en: -Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. Oh, God. -[car door closes]
No, have you seen my car today?
It was in the garage. Someone stole it!
-[panting] -She had to bring Conan to the vet because he swallowed, like, a rubber glove or something
translation.ko: 코난이 고무장갑을 삼켜서 병원에 데려가야 하는데

translation.en: and Ron needed the station wagon.
Hi. Excuse me. It's me again.
-We never officially met, but... -I can't right now. Sorry.
translation.ko: - 제대로 인사한 적 없... - 지금 바빠, 미안

translation.en: I know, buddy. Hang in there.
You can't eat everything you see.
Just let this be a good life lesson for you.
Oh, my God. Stop it! Don't do that!
Jesus! Charlie, what are you doing?
-What the hell is going on? -Just pull the car over.
translation.ko: - 대체 무슨 일이야? - 일단 차 세워봐

translation.en: Would you put that robot junk away? What are you thinking?
[Sally] You almost gave me a heart attack.
translation.ko: 심장마비 올 뻔했잖아 차 도둑인 줄 알았다

translation.en: I thought I was being carjacked. I'm taking the dog to the vet.
translation.ko: 심장마비 올 뻔했잖아 차 도둑인 줄 알았다 동물 병원 가는 중이야

translation.en: I can't believe you would take him without me.
Mom, I'm so worried about him!
He's my dog, too, you know.
What happened to Conan being Otis's dog?
You should not be driving in such an emotional state.
I know how you get during emergencies.
Oh, okay. I'm happy for you to drive.
You weren't wearing your helmet, by the way.
Sir. I thought you'd want to see this immediately.
translation.ko: 요원님, 당장 보셔야 할 것 같습니다

translation.en: Two of them just made contact in Texas.
Intel says they're heading west fast.
[Charlie] Okay, Bee, we need to go over a few things.
All right. [spits] I'm re-thinking the beach.
People can be terrible about things they don't understand.
If they find you, they'll probably lock you up in a lab somewhere and cut you into tiny little pieces.
translation.ko: 널 보면 실험실에 가두고 산산조각 낼 거야

translation.en: The only person you can show yourself around is me, okay?
translation.ko: 나 말고 누구에게도 널 드러내선 안 돼

translation.en: If you see anyone besides me, what do you do?
translation.ko: 내 옆에 누가 있으면 어떻게 한다고?

translation.en: Okay, so let's say we're driving and all of a sudden...
Oh, shoot! Somebody's here! Hide, Bee, hide!
Bee, it's too late. You're already dead.
[pilot] Fox-2 on approach. Non-biologicals are inbound.
The goal, sir, should be to communicate with them.
First contact with an alien species.
I've spent my whole life waiting for this moment.
If they make one wrong move, we put 'em down.
translation.ko: 수상한 낌새가 있으면 바로 박살 낼 거요

translation.en: The humans are multiplying. Please let me kill them.
Not yet. B-127's signal has gone silent.
translation.ko: 아직은 안 돼 B-127 신호가 사라졌어

translation.en: Listen up! I'm Agent Burns and this is... Dr. Powell.
translation.ko: 잘 들어! 난 번스 요원 여기는... 파월 박사다

translation.en: We currently have 100 guns pointed right at your head!
we are Decepticon peacekeepers patrolling the galaxy.
We believe a dangerous criminal from our world
How is it you think we can help?
You want access to our satellites?
But combined, they could be quite powerful.
No way! Out of the question!
We have a common enemy, Agent Burns.
translation.ko: 우리에겐 공통의 적이 있다 번스 요원

translation.en: There's a war raging on our planet.
If B-127 isn't found, that war may find its way here.
translation.ko: B-127을 찾지 않으면 여기까지 전쟁이 번질 것이다

translation.en: We can find a way to help one another.
We'll talk it over with our superiors.
In the meantime, if you could follow us.
[Charlie] Must suck being cooped up in a VW all day, huh?
translation.ko: 작은 차에 숨어 있는 거 되게 별로지?

translation.en: Is there anyone that can help you?
You know, like a mom, dad, siblings? You all love each other?
Or drive each other crazy and you can't wait to get away and start a whole new life.
translation.ko: 아니면 같이 있는 게 괴로워서 도망치고 싶어?

translation.en: Do you want me to see if I can fix it?
[Optimus distorted] B-127, I pray this message finds you.
That voice said something about a-- a war.
Is the VW Beetle some kind off... disguise?
-[John] And a criminal. -[Charlie] All right, I'm almost done.
[Brian on TV] Does that answer your question?
[Charlie] No way. Are you actually watching it?
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 진짜 보는 거야?

translation.en: You can pop in another one if you want.
translation.ko: 다른 거 보고 싶으면 비디오 틀어

translation.en: [Charlie's dad on tape] Whoo! Come on, sweetie!
This is Charlie Watson, future Olympic gold medalist.
-Thanks, Dad. -[Charlie's dad] How do you feel?
[Charlie] No, no, why would you play this?
Let's see if we got something.
[Charlie] You know, Bee, music can help you say what you're feeling.
translation.ko: 음악으로 네 기분을 표현할 수 있어

translation.en: You're gonna love this. It's brand new.
Hey, hey, please don't touch those. Please.
Do you want to hear it?
We used to listen to this while we'd work on the Corvette.
He used to say it would make the car feel better.
translation.ko: 이 노래 들으면 차도 기분 좋아질 거랬어

translation.en: We used to work on this car every weekend together.
That was the last time I saw him.
He died of a heart attack.
I never got to say goodbye.
You know, I always thought if I could just...
If I could just get it to start up again,
I say this with all due respect.
Have you lost your damn mind?
That was with all due respect? [General Whalen] The man's got a point, Doctor.
translation.ko: - 외람되다는 말은 왜 했소? - 번스 말도 일리는 있어요

translation.en: Our satellite network is at the forefront of our national defense.
It could be a once in a lifetime opportunity.
Can you imagine the advances an alliance with these creatures might bring?
translation.ko: 저들과의 동맹이 가져올 엄청난 성과를 생각해 보세요

translation.en: [Agent Burns] I imagine the advances. An advance on Washington.
-New York. An advance on Chicago! -That's not gonna happen.
They literally call themselves "Decepticons." That doesn't set off any red flags?
we're talking about the most advanced robotic system ever seen.
translation.ko: 지금껏 본 적 없는 최첨단 로봇 시스템입니다

translation.en: they'll just take their technology to the Russians instead.
translation.ko: 그 기술을 갖고 러시아에 갈 겁니다

translation.en: Do you really want to go down in history as the man who cost us the Cold War?
translation.ko: 러시아에 진 이유를 제공한 인물로 역사에 남고 싶으세요?

translation.en: We'll help them find their fugitive.
you can do all the experiments you want. Hmm?

translation.ko: "미국 특수 작전 본부" 여러분... 로봇 여러분

translation.en: [Dropkick] How kind of you to finally allow us in.
We're very happy to have you here as friends.
My superior has agreed to grant you limited access to our satellites.
In addition, you're welcome to use
It's the largest super-array of Crays on Earth.
We thank you for your hospitality.
Tell me, those vocal communication devices you use,
You got to pick a station, man. I know there's a lot of choices.
translation.ko: 한 번에 하나만 들어 무지 많은 건 알지만

translation.en: "You want to go on a date with me, maybe?"
What are you trying to do?
Here we go. Here we go.
You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd. You're not a nerd.
Okay, you're a nerd, but just don't let her see that you're nerdy.
Excuse me. Sorry to barge in. I just...
Just sit down, please? Shh, don't scream, okay?
translation.ko: 우선 좀 앉아 소리 지르지 말고

translation.en: It's okay, okay? Just breathe. Breathe.
Look, I know what you saw was a little crazy. I can explain.
translation.ko: 좀 이상한 거 봤지? 설명해 줄게

translation.en: Yeah, I can't explain. But here's the deal.
translation.ko: 사실 설명 못 해 하지만 이렇게 하자

translation.en: If you tell anyone what you just saw,
I'm gonna have to run you over with my car.
I don't mean that in a mean way. Okay? What I'm saying
is no one can know what you just saw, okay?
translation.ko: 방금 본 거 아무한테도 말하면 안 된다고, 알겠지?

translation.en: Bumblebee, you can... you can come out now.
He's been going up and down on that dial all day today and I don't know why.
You mean the shirt that I'm wearing?
Yes, yes! Come on. I'll give it back to you.
Come on! Give me your shirt!
Wait, wait, wait! Hey, no, no! You don't need to do this.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 하지 마! 안 그래도 돼

translation.en: -Come here. Come on! -No, I get it. I get it!
I know I promised you, but, yeah, you're not getting that back.
They're creating an interconnected web of information.
Volumes of data at their fingertips.
He's a weird guy. You ever notice that about Powell?
[Dr. Powell] They're tracking fluctuations in Energon levels.
It's like a heat signature specific to their species.
translation.ko: 저들 종족의 열 신호인 것 같습니다

translation.en: You've given them our satellites, our comms, God knows what else.
Yet, in the space of a day they've given us a way
to not only hunt down B-127,
Let them finish what they're doing. Let them find B-127.
And then I'll give you permission to destroy them all.
translation.ko: 그 후에는 모두 다 쓸어버려도 좋다

translation.en: [Memo] So you have no idea where he came from?
You thought about calling the cops?
What are they gonna do, Memo?
They're just gonna send him away to a lab and do weird science experiments on him.
translation.ko: 잡아다 온갖 이상한 실험을 할 텐데

translation.en: ♪ Plastic tubes and pots and pans... ♪
[chuckles] You're getting pretty good with that radio dial, Bee.
Yeah, D.J. Bumble in the house! [whoops]
♪ I can't live without my radio ♪
Is that why you're always messing with the dial?
[gasps] You're trying to teach yourself how to talk, aren't you?
♪ Walk like a man Talk like a man... ♪

translation.ko: 사람처럼 걷고 사람처럼 말하고 말도 안 돼

translation.en: Oh, my God, Bee, you're a genius! You're an actual genius! ♪ Hit it! ♪
-What is going on here? -[Memo] That's Jim from sixth period.
[chuckles] He said he was busy this week.
You want to check it out?
[man 1] Hey, everybody, come watch! Tripp's gonna jump!
-[woman 1] You're off your nut. -What's going on over there?
translation.ko: 완전 미쳤어! - 무슨 일이래? - 하지 마, 미쳤어?

translation.en: [woman 1] Don't do it, dude, you're crazy.
[Tripp] Come on, it's not that big a jump.
I mean, yeah. I spilled a gallon of lemonade on him once.
translation.ko: 얼마 전에 쟤한테 음료수 왕창 쏟았거든

translation.en: Doesn't anyone have the balls to jump off this thing with me?
[stammering] Yeah, I-- See, I didn't-- I didn't do that. I didn't actually--
Uh... No, sorry about that. It...
You were on the dive team with my little sister.
I saw you win state a couple years ago.
translation.ko: 몇 년 전에 주 대회 우승한 거 봤어

translation.en: This just got a whole lot more interesting.
We have a championship high-diver on our hands!
Yeah, I actually, I don't, I don't...
I don't do it anymore. Oh, don't worry. I won't make you go first.
translation.ko: - 이젠 다이빙 안 해 - 걱정 마, 내가 먼저 뛸게

translation.en: Dive Girl! You better not back out on me.
translation.ko: 너도 뛰어! 나 물 먹이지 말고

translation.en: [man] You guys, she's gonna do it! She's gonna do it!
-[all chanting] Dive! Dive! Dive! Dive! -[breathing deeply]
[Charlie's dad] You got this, Charlie girl!
-[man 1] Where you going? -[woman 1] What, are you scared?
[woman 1] What a loser! [man 1] Thought you said you were on the diving team.
[woman 1] I think she's gonna cry in her car.
-That was your big moment to look cool. -[women laugh]
It's in the garbage, Einstein. You throw them away after each use.
translation.ko: 쓰레기통에 있지 한 번 쓰고 버리는 거거든

translation.en: You should have your dad buy you a better one.
translation.ko: 아빠한테 새 차 사 달라지 그래?

translation.en: But I think I know something that'll make you feel better.
What about you, Bee? Want some revenge?
Come on. I got an idea.
You use it for when you...
Okay, look, Bee, you be our egg man.
You grab one of these, like so.
And that right there, that's your target. That's right.
[Charlie] I think we could just hand it to him... He could maybe, yeah, and then...
My heart right now is going crazy. -[siren blaring] -Uh-oh!
Bee, what are you doing? What are you doing?
Oh, my God, we're committing a felony!
We got a yellow vehicle driving its damn self through the Pico Tunnel.
translation.ko: 피코 터널에 노란색 차량이 무인 운전 중이다

translation.en: Morning, buddy. I got to go to work, okay?
Bee. Listen to me. You need to stay in this garage, okay?
After what happened last night, I'm pretty sure the cops are looking for you,
translation.ko: 어제 일로 경찰이 널 찾고 있을 텐데

translation.en: and, uh, you don't exactly blend in.
translation.ko: 어제 일로 경찰이 널 찾고 있을 텐데 넌 너무 눈에 띄어

translation.en: I need you to go to the frozen banana stand and steal some sticks.
translation.ko: 아이스크림 가게 가서 막대 좀 훔쳐 와

translation.en: Can't we just sell the hot dogs without the sticks?
We got a hit, I think. Where's that location?
Near San Francisco. A coastal town named Brighton Falls.
You got to come home right now.
It's bad. It's really, really bad.

translation.ko: 범블비 무슨 짓을 한 거야? 왜 이랬어?
무슨 짓을 한 거야? 왜 이랬어?

translation.en: I told you to hide in the garage!
I'm not mad, okay? This is all my fault.
I never should have left you.
[Memo] Hey, okay, maybe don't transform all the way?
We've still got to get you through the door.
And now you're crippled for life.
[Charlie] I'm sorry. This is all my fault.
What'd you do to my TV?
Look, Mom, I can explain. We will talk about this later, all right?
-Now, I have to go. -Are you kidding me?
It's about my car. It's really important.
That you spend all day and night shut in that garage, doing God-knows-what with?
Mom, I can't. I really can't right now.
Oh, no, you really can, Charlie.
Your attitude, your always sulking around.
You brought home that piece of crap without even asking me!
translation.ko: 말도 없이 집에 고물을 들여오질 않나!

translation.en: Everyone in this family is trying to be happy,
and all you want to do is make things harder.
You know, Mom, just because you've moved on and you're happy with your new life doesn't mean I have!
translation.ko: 엄만 다 잊고 행복하게 새 출발 했지만 난 아니야

translation.en: You've found a replacement for my dad and I haven't, okay, and I never will!
translation.ko: 엄만 아빠 대신할 사람 찾았지만 난 못 해, 안 해!

translation.en: So, I'm sorry if that makes things harder, but in ten months from now
translation.ko: 힘들게 했다니 미안하지만 열 달만 더 참아

translation.en: you won't even have to deal with me!
I just feel like ever since my dad died, I've become this drain on everyone, and I hate it.
translation.ko: 아빠가 돌아가신 후로 나만 겉도는 거 같아서 싫어

translation.en: It's like everybody expects me to act like nothing ever happened, and...
translation.ko: 나도 아무 일 없었던 척 살고 싶지만...

translation.en: About your dad... I'm really sorry.
You know, there's... there's this quote that I like.
"The darkest nights produce the brightest stars."
translation.ko: '가장 밝은 별은 가장 어두운 밤에 뜬다'

translation.en: My mom got it from Weight Watchers.
Get out and move away from the vehicle.
No, don't run. Do not run!
Please tell me they're on our side.
B-127, you're a traitor and a coward.
Tell us where Optimus Prime is hiding.
[Agent Burns] Your daughter stole government property, Mrs. Watson.
translation.ko: 따님은 정부 재산을 훔쳤습니다, 왓슨 씨

translation.en: but we had no idea it was this serious.
I didn't steal anything, and he doesn't belong to them.
translation.ko: 안 훔쳤어요 그 애는 내 거야!

translation.en: I can assure you that it is an "it".
And "it" is a highly dangerous war machine.
No, he isn't, okay, Mom? He's not some "war machine."
translation.ko: 아냐, 그 애는 전쟁 무기 아니에요

translation.en: I-- I don't know what he is, but...
Ma'am, your daughter's had a traumatic experience today.
Maybe doesn't understand everything she's seen.
translation.ko: 상황 인식을 제대로 못 하는 것 같습니다

translation.en: No, I'm fine, Mom. I'm completely fine, okay?
You have to believe me, please. I didn't steal anything!
Stop! Just go to your room.
When I was going through puberty,
-Stole a box of Mallomars once. -Yeah, we know.
Look, Otis, you need to go home and...
No, Otis, stop it! -Why would you do that? -[grunting]
translation.ko: 안 돼, 오티스! 왜 이러는 거야?

translation.en: Let go of me! -You're touching my buttocks! -[shushes]
I will tell you a secret if you shut up.
Okay, so, um, this is my room.
These are actually my sister's stuff.
She likes playing pranks, like putting her stuff over here.
-[Charlie] Can I, uh, sit down? -Yeah, yeah. Mmm-hmm.
[reporter on TV] Residents of Brighton Falls have been witness to an unusual sight this evening.
Armed Forces pouring into town as part of what we are told
translation.ko: 대규모 병력이 우리 지역 매키넌 공군 기지에

translation.en: setting up camp at our own McKinnon Air Base.
If Bumblebee's still alive, that's where they're keeping him.
translation.ko: 범블비가 살아 있다면 저기 갇혀 있을 거야

translation.en: We have to go. We have to try and save him.
Count me in. I'll take point.
-But I can help. Master Larry says I-- -I need someone here.
translation.ko: - 할 수 있어, 사부님이... - 여기도 누가 있어야 해

translation.en: to make sure that Mom and Ron don't know that I'm gone.
[Shatter] Tell us where Optimus Prime and the rebels are hiding,
translation.ko: 옵티머스 프라임과 저항군이 숨은 곳을 말해

translation.en: and we can end this war.
[Shatter] This doesn't concern you, human Powell.
[Memo] Are you sure this is a good idea?
[Charlie] It's a terrible idea, but I've got to try it.
[Memo] You can't get-- Well, why don't you-- Stop, stop, wait...
-How'd you know the power was off? -[Charlie] I didn't. Let's go.
translation.ko: - 전원 꺼진 거 어떻게 알았어? - 몰랐는데, 가자

translation.en: Regroup, rebuild, and retake our home.
But we must find refuge first.
Once we've gathered the others, we'll join you.
If the Decepticons find it, then our people are truly finished.
translation.ko: 디셉티콘이 찾아내면 우리 종족은 정말 끝이다

translation.en: This is our chance to wipe out the Autobot resistance for good.
We'll burn the whole planet to cinders.
[Shatter] We must get word to Cybertron immediately.
Tell them to bring an army.
[softly] Burns, we made a terrible mistake.
And thanks to our human allies,
I know just how to get the message home.
translation.ko: 고향까지 메시지를 보낼 수 있게 됐지

translation.en: Thank you for your hospitality, friend Powell.
-[Dr. Powell] You have to stop them! -Powell!
What, did she cut the wire to the TV?
Charlie's fallen ill and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
translation.ko: 누나는 아파서 저녁 내내 방에 있을 겁니다

translation.en: She wishes not to be troubled. Keep clear of her chambers.
translation.ko: 방해받기 싫다고 하니 침실 출입을 삼가세요

translation.en: and must stay in her bedroom for the rest of the evening.
-Mom, there is no reason to go... -Where is she?
[Shatter] I found a tower to transmit our message.
Talk to me, Bee, talk to me.
I can fix this. I can fix this.
You got to wake up, Bee. You got to wake up.
Come on, give me the other one.
I can't lose you, too, Bee.
Come on, Bee, we've got to get you out of here.
[Memo] Charlie, there's like a million guys out there!
Come on, Bee, you've gotta get up. Can you get up?
There's a door in my way.
-We got to go. -[Charlie] Bee, come on.
You've gotta get up, come on.
Get the kid out of here.
[Agent Burns] Come on, kid. Hey! No! [grunts]
-Let go of me! -You need to get away from that thing.
Stop it! [Agent Burns] Contain it and dismantle it!
He's more human than you'll ever be!
We need to get out of here.
We've got to get you someplace safe.
Bee, stop. They will kill you!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 범블비 널 죽일 거야!

translation.en: then our people are truly finished.
Go on. I'll buy you some time with these guys.
translation.ko: 먼저 가 난 여기서 시간을 벌게

translation.en: We should really look into getting seatbelts. Oh, my God, oh, my God.
It's okay. She's gonna steal the robot back, fight off the police,
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 누나가 로봇을 훔쳐서 경찰이랑 싸우고

translation.en: kill two bigger robots, and come right back home.
translation.ko: 거인 로봇 둘을 죽인 다음 집에 돌아올 거야

translation.en: [reporter on radio] Folks, this just breaking.
There appears to be a high-speed chase underway just outside McKinnon Air Base.
translation.ko: 매키넌 공군 기지 외곽에서 차량 추격전이 벌어졌습니다

translation.en: You lose that car, I will personally rip your face off.
translation.ko: 놓치면 네놈 얼굴 가죽을 벗겨줄 테다

translation.en: Oh, God! It's all under control.
You pull that car over right this second.
This is very unsafe, what you're doing.
Mom, you got to get out of here, okay?
[Charlie] Mom... You have to trust me, please!
-We got to help her, Ron! -Hang on.
Oh, my gosh! What are you doing?
I saw this on Miami Vice.
-Oh. Oh. I got it, I got it, I got it. -Oh, my God!
Ron! We have a kid in the car!
I was trying to save the other kid! What was I--
Otis? Otis, are you all right?
Preparing satellites to transmit our message.
I hate this plan. Bee, I want to help.
translation.ko: 이 계획 싫어 나도 돕고 싶다고

translation.en: ♪ I would hate anything To happen to her ♪
And you're listening to The Smiths.
Handle him! And finish the job this time!
How the hell am I gonna get up there?
There. The one on the tower.
You think these little chains can hold...
You need to get outta here.
I mean my friends are coming.
And they're gonna be looking for him.
Hey, can you call my mom?
Bee, I can't go with you.
You've got people out there that need you.
translation.ko: 네겐 널 필요로 하는 사람들이 있잖아

translation.en: for making me feel like me again.
Are you telling me you could've been a Camaro this whole time?

translation.ko: "보이는 것보다 가까이 있음" 날 잊지 말아요

translation.en: ♪ Look my way Never love me? ♪
translation.ko: 날 바라보고 절대 사랑하지 말아 주겠니?

translation.en: ♪ Rain keeps falling Rain keeps falling ♪
♪ Call my name or walk on by... ♪
translation.ko: 내 이름을 불러주든가 날 무시하고 지나쳐줘

translation.en: Thank God you're all right. Thanks for coming, Mom.
Well, I've taken a few notes.
I couldn't have done it without you guys.
Wow, um, what happened to you today?

translation.ko: 이거? 뭐... 로봇 전투, 추격전에 지구 멸망 위기 정도?
로봇 전투, 추격전에 지구 멸망 위기 정도?

translation.en: [Optimus] Old friend, you kept this planet safe.
Because of you, we have a future, B-127.
[man 1 on radio] My name... [man 2] Is... [Charlie] Bumblebee.
[Charlie] Let's see if we got something.
